document.full_text: the international monetary fund could withhold the next slice of aid to greece due next month, the head of euro zone finance ministers said on thursday, spooking markets with the possibility of default.
document.title: threat of imf withholding greek aid spooks markets
lines_and_colors: the international monetary fund could withhold the next slice of aid to greece due next month, the head of euro zone finance ministers said on thursday, spooking markets with the possibility of default.
